subject: Doping (Sports)
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador faces another hurdle in his bid to clear his name of doping allegations after the World Anti-Doping Agency said it was joining the appeal of the Spanish cycling federation’s decision to absolve him.
snippet: Alberto Contador faces another hurdle in his bid to clear his name of doping allegations after the World Anti-Doping Agency said it was joining the appeal of the Spanish cycling federation’s decision to absolve him.
